name: select

POST.summary:
Check if password adheres to local user password policy.
Access Group: authgrp

help: Check if password adheres to local user password policy.

valid.name: valid
valid.title: Is Valid
valid.description: True if the password adheres to the password policy.

minimum-length.name: minimum-length
minimum-length.title: Minimum Length
minimum-length.description: True when the password violates the minimum length requirement.

maximum-length.name: maximum-length
maximum-length.title: Maximum Length
maximum-length.description: True when the password violates the maximum length requirement.

invalid-user.name: invalid-user
invalid-user.title: User Requirement
invalid-user.description: True when the user type is invalid.

min-change-characters.name: min-change-characters
min-change-characters.title: Unique Characters
min-change-characters.description: True when the password violates the minimum unique characters requirement.

min-upper-case-letter.name: min-upper-case-letter
min-upper-case-letter.title: Uppercase Letters
min-upper-case-letter.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of uppercase letters requirement.

min-lower-case-letter.name: min-lower-case-letter
min-lower-case-letter.title: Lowercase Letters
min-lower-case-letter.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of lowercase letters requirement.

min-number.name: min-number
min-number.title: Numeric Characters
min-number.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of numeric characters requirement.

min-non-alphanumeric.name: min-non-alphanumeric
min-non-alphanumeric.title: Alphanumeric Characters
min-non-alphanumeric.description: True when the password violates the minimum number of alphanumeric characters requirement.

reuse-password.name: reuse-password
reuse-password.title: Reused
reuse-password.description: True when the password was previously used.

response_description: Check if the password provided conforms to the local user password policy.
